FuncDef: This command specifies an HTTP server TCP or UDP port number or port list to use in the application definition.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies that the value configured and the value in the flow are equal.
Specifies that the value configured differs from the value in the flow.
Specifies the name of the port list containing a set or range of ports, up to 32 characters.
Specifies a valid server port number. Values-0 to 65535.
